Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 10 Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika » 10.1 Paṭiccavāra » 10.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Aññamaññādi
Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Aññamaññādi
15.
1096Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati aññamaññapaccayā, nissayapaccayā, upanissayapaccayā, purejātapaccayā, āsevanapaccayā, kammapaccayā, vipākapaccayā, āhārapaccayā, indriyapaccayā, jhānapaccayā, maggapaccayā, sampayuttapaccayā, vippayuttapaccayā, atthipaccayā, natthipaccayā, vigatapaccayā, avigatapaccayā.
<< Sahajātaup10.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
